==Change History==

This page show a change history for all major changes done in new releases.
I use the following convention:<br>
*`*`* `=` Program change, *+* `=` new feature, *-* `=` removed feature

=== 20100724 ===
`*` Fixed [http://code.google.com/p/proxy-vole/issues/detail?id=5 Issue 5]: PAC Parser was not working correctly in multithreaded environments. <br>

=== 20100411 ===
`*` Fixed [http://code.google.com/p/proxy-vole/issues/detail?id=4 Issue 4]: Improved parser used to parse proxy urls from environment varibales and other places  <br>
